ChartsSqlDataDescriptorTemplate.GroupSqlStatement:
select VkJahr Jahr, VkMMM Key1, count(*) IWert1 from {0} {1}
group by VkJahr, VkMMM, VkMM, VkMonat order by VkMM
ChartsSqlDataDescriptorTemplate.DetailsSqlStatement: select KGS, KgsName, convert(varchar(10), VkDatum, 4) VkDatum, Kennzeichen, KdNr, Beleg, VkBur, PLZ, Strasse, Ort from {0} {1} order by VkDatum
